Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: Goldenrod Avenue continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: To the west is the end of the avenue. From here its possible to see the intersection with East Ulandia, which runs north and south through the village. Further west you can see the banks of the rives which separates the two parts of the village. The eastern part of the village is mostly used for low-rent housing and huge warehouses. The militia also keeps equipment here.
